title: Sweet Green
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Salad bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A restaurant that serves generous portions of salads, wraps, and frozen yogurt. There are usually soup specials, one vegan, one not. There are two specifically vegan options - sabzi and chick-p salad. All ingredients are organic and locally sourced. There is a strong focus on reducing carbon footprint.
